title: Grateful Dead Live at Poplar Creek Music Theater on 1983-06-27
source: Sennheisser 421s>Sony TCD5M>cassette>Sony TCD5M; FOB Recorded by the late George "Fingers" Bethke; first gen. cassettes>Nakamichi CD1, azimuth adjusted>Korg MR1000 (1 bit 5.6MHz); 24/96 with Korg Audiogate; 16/44.1 by Izotope Ozone's MBIT+ (for all dithering), and Weiss Saracon SRC (all sample rate conversions). Transfer by Dave Cohen February 2011
